content: आधिः [आधीयते स्थाप्यते प्रतीकाराय मनोऽनेन, आ-धाकि <ls>P. III. 3. 92</ls>; connected with आध्यै in some senses] {@--1@} Mental pain or anguish, agony, anxiety, (<ab>opp.</ab> व्याधि which is bodily pain); न तेषामापदः संति नाधयो व्याधयस्तथा <ls>Mb.</ls>; मनोगतमाधिहेतुं <ls>Ś. 3. 11</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 27</ls>, <ls n="R.">9. 54</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 105</ls>; <ls>Bv. 4. 11</ls>; <ls>Māl. 4</ls>; <ls>Ki. 1. 37.</ls> {@--2@} A bane, curse, misery; यांत्येवं गृहिणीपदं युवतयो वामाः कुलस्याधयः <ls>Ś. 4. 17</ls>; <ls>Mv. 6. 28.</ls> {@--3@} A pledge, deposit, pawn, mortgage; <ls>Y. 2. 23</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 143.</ls> {@--4@} A place, residence. {@--5@} Location, site. {@--6@} Definition, epithet. {@--7@} Misfortune, calamity (व्यसन). {@--8@} Reflection on religion or duty (धर्मचिंता). {@--9@} Hope, expectation. {@--10@} A man solicitous for the maintenance of his family (कुटुंबव्यापृत).
